release.description: Changes on how the changelog is produced
release.action: Applied last PHPCS settings from our sonar configuration.
Successfully upgraded test from crappy PHPCS template to pure PHPUnit tests
First ABC based test, what a crap
Minimal README for my fellow coworkers

release.description: Changes on how the changelog is produced
release.action: Update build.sh to handle MAC platform. Update package.xml
Add new sniff to forbid usages of non multibyte functions

release.description: Changes on how the changelog is produced
release.action: Set violation severity to 0 for Generic.Functions.OpeningFunctionBraceKernighanRitchie.BraceOnNewLin e
Added a sniffer that refuses singleton usage in non-static, non whitelisted class/methods
Fixed a bug preventing actions.class.php file with no parent sfActions to be scanned by SfActionsPerClassSniff.
Fixed a bug where a sfActions with abstract function cycled to death.

release.description: Changes on how the changelog is produced
release.action: Added a sniffer that count the executeXXXX() methods from sfActions class, and requires low values.
SfActionsMethodDeclarationSniff adds expectations on method parameters.
Attempt to add some homemade sniffs for Symfony, got difficulties with unit testing tough.
Fixed (again) build script, tgz now install itself

release.description: Changes on how the changelog is produced
release.action: Added a sniffer that count the executeXXXX() methods from sfActions class, and requires low values.
SfActionsMethodDeclarationSniff adds expectations on method parameters.
Attempt to add some homemade sniffs for Symfony, got difficulties with unit testing tough.
Fixed (again) build script, tgz now install itself
Moved in a more PEAR-like path
Initial commit (based on Zikula PHPCS rules).
